availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Clayton, Pendleton County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer. Married Eveline Fryer. Father of Robert A. Norris, George E. Norris, John W. Norris, James T. Norris, Henry Bascum Norris, and Charles Calvin Norris.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Clayton post office, p. 227.

Find A Grave, Entry for William Norris (1815-1891), Find A Grave Memorial # 50026353, Mount Auburn Cemetery, Mount Auburn, Pendleton County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=50026353&ref=acom (accessed 17 Jul 2017).
